item.title: CVE-2024-30459|2024-05-08T13:22:46.769Z -- AIpost -- AI WP Writer
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in AIpost AI WP Writer.This issue affects AI WP Writer: from n/a through 3.6.5.
